mapper.select: SELECT F.FRIEND_NO , F.WRITER , F.TITLE , F.CONTENT , F.ENROLL_DATE , F.DELETE_YN , F.EDIT_DATE , F.LOCATION_NO , L.LOCATION_NAME as locationName , M.NAME as writerName FROM FRIEND F LEFT JOIN LOCATION L ON (F.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (F.WRITER = M.NO) WHERE F.DELETE_YN = 'N'
